 Is this case really an encroachment on civil rights, or is the conduct of the laywer in question really as Sherry Colb, Rutgers law professor says, "...brings shame to a profession that depends on lawyers' ability to remember that no matter what anyone says of us, we are not and must never become hired guns"?
